title: Eurosport - Wikipedia
snippet: In July 2017, Eurosport had secured the domestic and international rights from 2017 to 2020 of the Italian Lega Basket Serie A (LBA). Eurosport is the new owner of the pay TV, international and internet rights.

title: Eurosport - Crunchbase Company Profile & Funding
snippet: Eurosport is a pan-European television sports network, owned and operated by Discovery Communications.

title: Eurosport | Warner Bros. Entertainment Wiki | Fandom
snippet: Owned by Warner Bros. Discovery through its TNT Sports International unit, it operates two main channels—Eurosport 1 and Eurosport 2—across most of its territories, and streams on Max and Discovery+. Originally ...
